attributes.action: G4S to pay a bonus to Military personnel involved in London 2012
attributes.additional_details:
G4S have made millions of pounds from the London 2012 games, yet were unable to deliver the required security, the armed forces were drafted in to ensure the security of the games.
In recogntion of the efforts made by service personnel, all those involved in many case at short notice they should each receive a one off payment of 1000 pounds from G4S, as recogntion for their time and support. The goverment should fully support this and request G4S to make the payments ASAP.
